title: Please, oh be so kind and help me.
author: nara21b

comments.content: Probably [Novocento Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072906/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/synthview/novecento) (thanks to [more samples](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072906/http:/asheathes.tumblr.com/post/107230628650/drop-the-just-facebook-its-cleaner-click) and mainly /Q on this [one](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072906/http:/41.media.tumblr.com/b407684aae0ec374ee07acc0a1a354e6/tumblr_mwhkf6VgwI1qmor6lo3_r1_500.png)).
